observation: Home - Miles Software  This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more Got it! Primary Menu Products Back MoneyWare Wealth Management Asset Management Portfolio Management Collateral & Loan Management Custody Trust Banking Solution Islamic Wealth Solution Investment Compliance Investment Compliance Monitoring Global Disclosures Monitoring AIFMD+Annex IV Reporting Depositary Oversight Insights Case Studies Case Studies Europe White Papers Testimonials Videos Careers Contact M o n S c a L e P s i r B & W T f t h x C Y I l b 2 0 now an Integral part of EbixCash +Know   More Miles Software Asset And Portfolio Management Fintech Leader In The Wealth, The Powerful Fuel To Help You Manage Your Client's Financial Assets On The Cloud, On The Go, On The Web Scale, Flexibility And Affordability MoneyWare Wealth Management Tool Allows You To Do More We Help You Grow Your Client’s Wealth & Assets As a financial services provider, you are under tremendous pressure to grow your client’s wealth and make smart investment decisions. You want your portfolio, wealth and AUM (Assets Under Management) to achieve optimal performance. Our  comprehensive suite of services including Moneyware, our #1 ranking Private Banking solution suite, InvestmentPro, our Cloud based investment management solution platform, and technology innovated services brings a whole new dimension of ease, agility, analysis and intelligence to wealth, portfolio and asset management. Find out how you can make effective and informed decisions, deliver measurable results and keep customers delighted. read more 360 degree automation of the wealth management life cycle to help wealth managers achieve optimal performance on their client's investments.  Investment Pro A fully integrated, secure and pay-as-you-go Portfolio Management solution on the cloud. Automated and integrated investment management solution to support your growth strategies. Custody Solutions A one-stop solution to manage the entire custody financial services business. Follow us on Market leader Largest Available in What Our Clients say ABOUT US “MoneyWare Custody has allowed us to meet our dynamic client demands and expectations in terms of services and quality of reports. The solution has helped Bank One to be at par with the competitors and in some cases go beyond. It is always a pleasure to work with Miles Software for the prompt support where they are always ready to go that extra mile to ensure client satisfaction.” “We have been using MoneyWare Wealth Management Suite since 2011. Recently we upgraded it from version 11.1 to 15.3 to focus on enhanced customer experience. Miles leveraged its expertise in financial service technology space and implemented a system that was suitable for Tata Capital. The new interface will help us to achieve quicker processing time and be more competitive to facilitate future growth.” “We are pleased to use MoneyWare (Collateral based) Lending Solutions, that offer us end to end collateral monitoring mechanism for our Loan Against Securities Business. Miles has proven its expertise in the financial domain and showed deep understanding of our requirements and facilitated timely delivery of the expected solution. We thank the Miles team for  the implementation of MoneyWare at Fullerton India.” “State Bank of India has partnered with Miles Software for its wealth management technology solution. The solution was implemented in three months and executed seamlessly in a cohesive manner. I am very impressed with the professionalism and commitment and the team’s’ approach in helping us overcome the challenge of integrating with multiple third party systems. We are confident that this partnership with Miles Software will truly enhance our competitiveness in the market.” “Financial advisors present the customer portfolio sliced and diced with every conceivable piece of information. Customers feel their investments are taken care of, which leads to stronger relationships”. “We have found the people at Miles Software to be professional in their approach, very knowledgeable and always keen to help. The system enhancement for our particular needs, and the subsequent installation was effortless and the software has been proved to be stable”. A UK based Investment Manager We are using FundWare Investment Compliance & Regulatory Reporting solution for over a year. FundWare enables us to do daily compliance check for UCITS rules, along with the Annex IV reporting, Liquidity and Leverage monitoring under AIFMD. The solution has helped us manage multiple regulatory requirements of our clients under a single technology solution, bringing in operation efficiencies and cost reduction. The support team has been very responsive to our needs and have the technical and functional expertise to meet our requirements. “MoneyWare Fund Management enables our asset managers to focus on growing client investments that boosts trust and confidence. And the cost savings and regulatory compliance is a big plus”. “MoneyWare custody is a scalable and stable solution. It has enabled the bank to improve operational efficiency and provide a total view of all accounts and interactions it has with its customers. Additionally, the solution also improves the quality and consistency of services to our clients”. “Miles has proven their expertise in the financial domain by deploying a cost-effective solution for our custodial business. We are delighted with the commitment and professionalism shown by the Miles team during the implementation & support of the custodial software”. “We are delighted to collaborate with Miles Software in a quest to drive our new lending portfolio – Loans Against Securities for our newly launched consumer finance business. This partnership aims to leverage their platform and domain expertise to provide a seamless financing experience to our customers on the MoneyWare Collateral Based lending platform. The team has an excellent record of accomplishment on the domain. Their swift deployment has helped us launch products quickly with simplicity and innovation”. Grow Your Client’s Wealth! Write To Us at info@milessoft.com Or Call Us Phone: +91-22-68331464 Email: CRM Financial Planning Order & Trade Management Revenue & Incentive Management Family Office Mobility Solution Robo Advisory Fund Accounting Pension Fund Administration Portfolio Risk & Performance Analytics FundWare for AIFMD FundWare for Depositaries Support & Integration Services Enterprise Data Management Reporting Services SaaS Compliance & Regulatory Reporting Discover Miles Our Story Our Team Technology Alliances News Events Support Support & Privacy Policy Stock Prices – NAV Site map Cookie Policy Δ 2017 © Copyrights Miles Software

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain is legitimately registered to "Ebix Inc," which is a known company, and the domain has been registered since 2001. This long-standing registration and connection to a legitimate company reduces the likelihood of it being a scam. The contact details also seem appropriate for a business. However, I should verify if the information on the website is updated and check the online reputation of the website.

thought: The certificate information shows that the website has a valid SSL certificate, which is a good sign of a legitimate and secure site. The certificates are issued by reputable Certificate Authorities like DigiCert and GoDaddy, and they are current, not expired. This indicates that the website is likely maintained and that the owners are invested in its security. There are no immediate red flags from the certificate data. Before concluding, I should cross-reference the company's reputation and check for any public complaints or scam reports.

The Glassdoor reviews suggest it is a legitimate company with mixed employee feedback, but no indication of a scam. The other links are general resources for reporting scams and do not provide specific information about "Miles Software" being involved in any fraudulent activities. It has a legitimate SSL certificate, is registered to a known company, and does not have scam reports associated with it.
